title: Security Incident Procedure - 2022
content: All data incidents must be reported within 48 hours to the IT department using the Incident Report Form. Employees should contact the IT Helpdesk immediately upon discovering an incident. A security incident includes any unauthorized access, data loss, or system compromise. The IT department is responsible for coordinating the initial response and assessment. All incidents must be documented in the central incident tracking system within the 48-hour window. Failure to report within the specified timeframe may result in disciplinary action.
